trans-unit.note: A link to Settings | System | Backup Action or verb that can be used for %1 in settings_encryption-la-encrypt_user_data_warning and settings_encryption-la-encrypt_user_data_description Strongly proposing user to do a backup.

trans-unit.id: settings_encryption-la-battery_chargingBattery level low. Do not remove the charger.
trans-unit.source: Battery level low. Do not remove the charger.
trans-unit.note: Battery low warning for device reset when charger is attached. Same as settings_reset-la-battery_charging ---------- Battery low warning for device encryption when charger is attached.
Battery low warning for device reset when charger is not attached. Same as settings_reset-la-battery_level_low ---------- Battery low warning for device encryption when charger is not attached.

trans-unit.id:
settings_encryption-la-encrypt_user_data_descriptionThis will erase all user data from the device. This means losing user data that you have added to the device, reverts apps to clean state, accounts, contacts, photos and other media.

%1 user data to memory card before encrypting the device.
trans-unit.source:
This will erase all user data from the device. This means losing user data that you have added to the device, reverts apps to clean state, accounts, contacts, photos and other media.

%1 user data to memory card before encrypting the device.

seg-source.mrk: This will erase all user data from the device.

This means losing user data that you have added to the device, reverts apps to clean state, accounts, contacts, photos and other media.

%1 user data to memory card before encrypting the device.

target.mrk: Ol enjamdaky ähli ulanyjy maglumaty pozar.

Şu diýmek, siziň enjama goşan ulanyjy maglumaty ýitirmek, goýmalary, hasaplary, kontaktlary, fotosuratlary we başga media arassa ýagdaýa dikeltmek.

Enjamy şifrlemekden öň %1 ulanyjy maglumaty ýat kartasyna.

trans-unit.note: Takes "Back up" (settings_encryption-la-back_up) formatted hyperlink as parameter. This is done because we're creating programmatically a hyperlink for it.

trans-unit.id: settings_encryption-la-encryption_user_data_descriptionYour user data is encrypted which means that only authorized users can access it. Users are authenticated with security code.
trans-unit.source: Your user data is encrypted which means that only authorized users can access it. Users are authenticated with security code.

seg-source.mrk: Your user data is encrypted which means that only authorized users can access it.
Users are authenticated with security code.

target.mrk: Ulanyjy maglumaty şifrlenen, diýmek diňe ygtyýarly ulanyjylar oňa girip biler.

trans-unit.note: Shown in the Settings -> Encryption page when user data is already encrypted.

trans-unit.id:
settings_encryption-la-encrypt_user_data_warningAccepting this will erase all user data on the device. This means losing user data that you have added to the device (e.g. reverts apps to clean state, accounts, contacts, photos and other media). %1 user data to memory card.

This is an irreversible change and you will need to enter a security code on all future boots in order to access your data.

If you accept the device will reboot automatically and you will be prompted for the security code before encrypting user data.
trans-unit.source:
Accepting this will erase all user data on the device. This means losing user data that you have added to the device (e.g. reverts apps to clean state, accounts, contacts, photos and other media). %1 user data to memory card.

This is an irreversible change and you will need to enter a security code on all future boots in order to access your data.

If you accept the device will reboot automatically and you will be prompted for the security code before encrypting user data.

seg-source.mrk: Accepting this will erase all user data on the device.
This means losing user data that you have added to the device (e.g. reverts apps to clean state, accounts, contacts, photos and other media).

%1 user data to memory card.

This is an irreversible change and you will need to enter a security code on all future boots in order to access your data.

If you accept the device will reboot automatically and you will be prompted for the security code before encrypting user data.

target.mrk: Ony kabul etmek enjamdaky ähli ulanyjy maglumaty pozar.
Şu diýmek, siziň enjama goşan ulanyjy maglumaty ýitirmek (goýmalary, hasaplary, kontaktlary, fotosuratlary we başga media arassa ýagdaýa dikeltmek).

%1 ulanyjy maglumat ýat kartasyna.

Bu ýatyrylmadyk üýtgetme we maglumatyňyza girmek üçin siz ähli geljek işledişlerde howpsuz kody girizmeli.

Eger siz kabul etseňiz, enjam awtomatiki täzeden başlar we ulanyjy maglumaty şifrlemekden öň sizden howpsuzlyk kody soralar.

trans-unit.note: Takes "Back up" (settings_encryption-la-back_up) formatted hyperlink as parameter. This is done because we're creating programmatically a hyperlink for it.

trans-unit.id: settings_encryption-la-make_backup_and_restore_itHow do I make a backup and restore it?
trans-unit.source: How do I make a backup and restore it?

seg-source.mrk: How do I make a backup and restore it?

target.mrk: Men ätiýaçlama nähili etmeli we ony nähili dikeltmeli?

trans-unit.id: settings_encryption-la-encrypt_user_data_security_code_noticeYou will need to enter your security code before user data can be encrypted.
trans-unit.source: You will need to enter your security code before user data can be encrypted.

seg-source.mrk: You will need to enter your security code before user data can be encrypted.

target.mrk: Ulanyjy maglumat şifrläp bilmekden öň, siz öz howpsuzlyk kody girizmeli.

trans-unit.source: You will need to set a security code before user data can be encrypted.

seg-source.mrk: You will need to set a security code before user data can be encrypted.

target.mrk: Ulanyjy maglumat şifrläp bilmekden öň, siz öz howpsuzlyk kody bellemeli.
